title: Audacy Stream Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a live audio stream available to listen to
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio page by selecting "Audio" from the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user can locate the Stream request in Charles by searching for https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/

title: Audacy Call Sign
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a live game available to listen to
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio page by selecting Audio from the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user can find the call sign in Charles by searching for https://live.wostreaming.net/manifest/{audacyCallsign}.m3u8

title: Audacy Config Flag
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is listening to a live Audacy feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the mid-roll implementation behind a config flag.

title: Audacy Hide Scrubber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has entered the audio menu
AND the user selected a game with an Audacy feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Audacy feed on the Audio Page for that specific game
custom_expected:
THEN the scrubber will be hidden
AND the jump buttons will be hidden
